website_summaries.verdict: Consistent in terms of texture and feel, and formulated to help all kinds of foot needs.
pros: While thick in texture, this cream absorbs quickly
A favorite for its solid brand name as well as the price and results
Often used by those with other health concerns as well
cons: Won't perform miracles, but it can help heal the skin on your feet

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware
customer_reviews.text: My tubes came not properly filled! One tube was as much as half empty. This item was listed as being non-refundable but, since it’s a product I’ve used happily for years, I wasn’t too bothered. I figured I knew exactly what I was getting, but was pretty upset when it turned out I’d been shortchanged in volume. You’d be better off buying in-store, where you can be sure you’ll get full bottles.
customer_reviews.author: A.H.

customer_reviews.title: Best foot cream ever
customer_reviews.text: If you have extremely dry and cracked feet or just want extremely soft feet, this is the product that beats all foot creams out there! It’s thick so I recommend putting some socks on after you apply to your feet or put it on before bed. It’s a luxurious feeling when your feet feel this soft and smooth! No overwhelming smells either. I don’t mind the peppermint smelling foot lotions but some can be a bit too much or smell weird. This cream is the best I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Softball Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Product is good, it soften my dry heels but the container is almost half less
customer_reviews.author: yutek

customer_reviews.title: A Little Bit Goes a Long Way
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect cream lotion for dry feet. My feet get so dry in the winter that they can become painful. I put a little bit of this lotion on, then put on some fluffy socks, and my feet feel so much better in the morning. This will forever be my go-to recommendation for dry feet!
customer_reviews.author: Gabby

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I have tried other top selling foot cream which have been fine/OK. I am much more impressed with the Gold Bond Foot Cream and will continue to purchase this instead of the O'Keefes. It seems to smooth more easily onto the skin and absorb well. It is not messy and putting on a spa sock at bedtime makes for very soft feet. Not greasy, good smell, overall great.
customer_reviews.author: hollybd

customer_reviews.title: Easy squueze, works great
customer_reviews.text: I love Gold Bond products, but it can't be said that every one is easy to pump out of the dispenser. Thise one is. Works well, especially if used consistently. Don't forget the spot on the back of your ankle, where the skin likes to unexpectedly crack. If you travel, buy an extra for your suitcase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Still St. Leigh

customer_reviews.title: It smells bad. ReALLY BAD.
customer_reviews.text: I did not use it long enough to see how effective it was on my feet, as it smelled so foul, I simply could not continue its use. I can't return it either, so it's going in the garbage. What do I do? Give it to a not so friend? I use Miracle Foot Repair and other expensive products for my dry heels. Gold Bond is a low end cheap product for cheapies. Take a pass, save up your sheckles, and get something that won't make you smell like a dirty diaper.
customer_reviews.author: DAVISION INC.

customer_reviews.title: Works but not much in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing! However the bottle came less than half full... not sure if that is normal.
customer_reviews.author: lindsay h.

customer_reviews.title: Works but came over halfway empty!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived over half way empty! Not happy at all about that. The photos above show how half full it came after all the air was squeezed out. I've tried this product before and it works well if you are consistent in putting it on daily. Maybe consider buying from somewhere else so you get a full bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Marie

customer_reviews.title: This stuff really works!
customer_reviews.text: I was suffering with a painful cracked heel, and had a lot of calloused tissue on both feet. I bought this product as a first resort; I also bought an electronic foot spa and a number of other emollients. The foot spa is still unopened in the box (four months later), and the emollients are still unopened and probably lost somewhere in the house. This stuff works wonders. Within a day the painful cracking was gone, and now, with very intermittent use, my feet are in the best shape they've been in years. I'm skeptical of most OTC products, but this one is (sorry about this...) worth it's weight in Gold.
customer_reviews.author: Howard

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I use this twice daily; after my morning shower and more importantly, after my evening shower. I love the fact that it does not leave any greasy/oily residue. My feet are soft and very well moisturized after use. I have a couple pressure points under my feet and because of gym, they sometimes have small calluses on those areas that pedicures can’t always help with. This cream has helped A LOT with that and so I highly recommend. The scent is also very subtle, which I appreciate. Just wish the tube was bigger :-(
customer_reviews.author: ASG

customer_reviews.title: Love it - Will Purchase Again
customer_reviews.text: Nice, really like this stuff. Arrived packaged well, no leaking. REALLY helped my dry feet, I've been putting off getting a pedicure for social distancing reasons so my feet really needed some TLC and this has been perfect, so at first it gave a sort of oily feel but after using it for a few days my feet are soft and smooth. Will definitely be purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Weston & Lacey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Pass this has parabens
customer_reviews.text: Really hoped this would help my summer feet which are always dry and cracked, but my bad for not researching enough there are parabens and I’m always trying to avoid as I have thyroid issues already and they disrupt your hormones. Unable to return so for natural product buyers I’d say pass on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Julared

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product does wonders for rough, dry heels. I've always had rough heels, year round. I even had a deep crack on one heel for years, which nothing seemed to help. I started using this cream on my heels after each shower. It didn't seem to be doing anything particularly amazing--my heels weren't noticeably softer or anything. However, one day after about a month, I went to show someone the crack in my heel, and it was gone! Very pleasantly surprised. This foot cream does the trick, but very subtly. The scent isn't the best, but since it's on my feet, I'm not too concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Jen D.

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works wonders and was recommended by my doctor.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is incredible! I have new calluses on my heels that cracked and are incredibly painful. I went to my doctor about it and she recommended this stuff. She said it desolves the calluses and she is right! Could not find in store but as always...I amazoned it! This stuff works wonders! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley von Eschenbach

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cream  but, only half full tube.
customer_reviews.text: I love all Gol Bond Products..I really needed this to help my feet after wearing sandals all the time. I thought this would be great and it is BUT. it came only half full. I’d return it if I didn’t need it right now...plus for the small price..it’s not worth the time to. I will try to find it in a store from now on..whenever I’m able to. Quality control slipped up on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Joan Cappolino

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product a few days ago and started using it right before bed. I rub it on both feet and then sleep with thick socks on to retain the moisture and take them off in the morning. This foot lotion works! My feet are softer and smoother than they have ever been! We have a concrete area in our backyard that shreds your feet if you walk barefoot on it so I had to buy some of this in hopes it would fix my feet and it did! No more sandpaper toes or heels! Definitely pleased with my purchase. I recommend it and would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, thick lotion
customer_reviews.text: Good, thick lotion. I don't think it really "improves" the softness, but when applied after a shower I think it prevents my feet from drying out and keeps the bottoms more supple. I don't have a lot of roughness or callous buildup, so I suspect it would not be helpful if you do. It's not a replacement for a pumice stone but does provide a good level of moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: So-So
customer_reviews.text: This definitely does more for my heels than just the regular body lotion I use does...but I don't care for the smell and I appreciate amthat it doesn't make your feet greaay. Although, I have nearly knocked myself out walking on the ceramic tiles in the kitchen when I don't wait long enough for my skin to absorb the lotion. It isn't quickly absorbed. I keep it on my night stand and use it before I go to sleep so I don't have to worry about slipping. Not sure I'll order again though, the smell just isn't for me so I'll probably check out something else.
customer_reviews.author: Louwho

customer_reviews.title: Smells awful.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this product. My expectation was really high due to the high review. But after a week of use I can't see that it does any different than a regular body Lotion (Compare with Aveeno/Lubriderm). I guess I'm just going to stick with my Body shop lotions or butter cream since they use the same ingredient anyway - Shea butter only the body shop lotions smell so much better.
customer_reviews.author: JeanGrey

customer_reviews.title: Love this cream for my very rough feet
customer_reviews.text: Very moisturising indeed, my feet are much softer only after two days of using it. Very slight pleasant smell - I am very sensitive to smells, so I was worried that it would be overpowering, but it is not. Scent is very light and fresh. One does need to use too much, just a few "drops". Comes out of the tube easy, so no hard squeezing action is required. Absorbs very well and does not form a sticky film. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: IM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice foot cream
customer_reviews.text: I have a fondness for the Gold Bond Ultimate line, especially the thicker creams. I use the Healing Cream extensively and have used the Healing Hand Cream as well, but decided to try the Softening line when it came to my tough heels. Like the others, it soaks in well without any unpleasant odor or heavy greasiness. It doesn't take a lot of product and I don't have to spend a long time massaging it in. My feet genuinely felt softer and less dry after one use.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C.

customer_reviews.title: Not just for feet
customer_reviews.text: I have had a very difficult time finding a lotion that will moisturize my hands enough so they don't feel like sandpaper that also doesn't have a strong odor. I actually used this on my elbow because it was so rough it was catching on the inside of my sleeves. In just 4 days of use, my elbow was smoother and not catching. My hands are also much smoother and the rough callus on my finger is finally not split and all without an odor that's offensive to my husband. Highly recommend this lotion!
customer_reviews.author: LD 825571

customer_reviews.title: Best foot cream ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried a number of creams and nothing has ever worked better than this one. It last all day and the next until you wash it off. I will never buy another foot cream again. this is the only one that I will use going forward, hands-down the best foot cream ever! my feet have never been softer, they looks like I just had a pedicure. it’s that great I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mad

customer_reviews.title: Bringing life back to my feet
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this product on my hands and feet (with socks) for the past 3 nights as my bedtime routine and it’s already making a difference. Without a regular pedi, my feet have gotten rough and extra dry and with all the extra hand washing (covid-19) my hands have been in horrible shape and this has helped more than any other lotions I’ve tried. Curious to see what progress, if any, develops in the next 2/3 weeks of use.
customer_reviews.author: Angela007

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: I have used Gold Bond ultimate healing for years on my feet. Decided to try this when I saw it and it's the best! Got two and will be reordering more soon. It softens my feet and they stay soft all day. It soaks right into my skin and leave my socks not greasy.
customer_reviews.author: robert falls

customer_reviews.title: Maybe got ripped off or is the product just like this
customer_reviews.text: I’ll start by saying this product actually seems to be working for my feet and it smells really good. However, the bottle was arrived like it was kinda empty. When I first opened it, I noticed there wasn’t a seal of any kind which there usually are in products like these. And I had to squeeze hard and for quite a bit to get some out when a new bottle I should just have to lightly squeeze and some should come out. I think I got ripped off, oh well. At least it works.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered defective. The product came almost empty. I’ll have to call for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: DJW

customer_reviews.title: Bottle came less than half filed
customer_reviews.text: I like the effectiveness of the cream which softens my skin very well. The bottle came LESS than half filed and no tamper proof seal. Next time I will buy in the store.
customer_reviews.author: Joe133

customer_reviews.title: BEST DRY HEELS -  cracked heels CREAM EVER!
customer_reviews.text: We're in boots a lot, my wife everyday. This has been a life saver for her and her pedicurist when other favorite creams just didn't do too well.. For the first time ever... Syndrome of cracked heels began this winter... Get this if you suffer from stubborn thick heel calluses with cracks! You'll still need debridement. Or heels that callus quickly between pedi-visits. Or a great life, lived in rubber boots!
customer_reviews.author: THE DUDE

customer_reviews.title: Best I've found yet!
customer_reviews.text: This product has made a huge difference. The soles of my feet are very dry and hard. I put this cream on at night then wear socks to bed. In the morning I use a foot file, while in the shower, and my feet are sooo much better. I would definitely recommend this product! Warning: it has an unpleasant smell but totally worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Duprez

customer_reviews.title: Gold Bond Ultimate Softening Foot Cream
customer_reviews.text: So far, the product does what it claims. Softening my dry feet making my skin feel so smooth. It is a thick lotion, so you do not have to use a lot. Wish it was sold in a larger container. A Good buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: mary s

customer_reviews.title: Great price great results
customer_reviews.text: This product was less expensive than the previous shea butter lotion I used before. The price was 1/3 of that product and the results were as goog or better. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: As my feet are more like the desert floor than human flesh, I've tried about everything on them. One try with this lotion before bedtime and some soft socks on and in the morning all the catchy thorns were gone and they didn't sting like they usually do from being dry. I suspect a few days of this and I'll be a regular customer.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R. Day

customer_reviews.title: Nice less but still initially greasy soft all day foot cream
customer_reviews.text: You definitely have to wear socks if you apply at night but feet stay soft all day. Scent is not very strong and lotion not as greasy as Neutrogenia Norwegian formula foot cream and lasts longer than that product or Vaseline, which I’ve also tried. Be careful if you shower in the morning after using at night. Feet won’t be greasy but Slippery in shower.
customer_reviews.author: WendyF

customer_reviews.title: It's alright
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best foot cream, honestly. It doesn't seem to do a whole lot more than a regular lotion. It does soak in easily and doesn't feel oily or anything, and it smells nice, so that's why I gave it a few stars. I just wouldn't go as far as saying that it definitely softens dry, calloused feet for more than a few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Works so well!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing! Due to COVID-19 and not being able to get a pedicure, my feet were In rough shape. ONE night of using this and they are so soft!!!! It’s heavy, but I only moisturize my feet at bed time so no biggie!
customer_reviews.author: J. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: Omgosh this is amazing! My feet have been extra dry bc of the pandemic (no pedicure) This fixed it right up. I put it on at night bc it is thick and it takes a bit for it to soak in. I HATE the feeling of lotion on my hands and feet, that's why I put it on at night.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn J.

customer_reviews.title: Best Foot Cream I've Tried
customer_reviews.text: I've bought $4 foot cream and $40 foot cream. I've tried pumice stones and healing balms and gel socks, but this $5 bottle of foot cream blows everything out of the water, especially if you apply it every day after your shower and put some socks on. I've been doing it for years now and me feet look like they get daily manicures. You dont need a lot and it lasts forever.
customer_reviews.author: michelle

customer_reviews.title: Works great, not a great smell
customer_reviews.text: I bought this lotion to use along with an Amope that I also bought on amazon. Honestly I just searched foot lotion and this price seemed reasonable enough to spend on a lotion that I might not like. It was very thick and definitely did its job of moisturizing my feet after using the Amope, but I didn't care for the smell. It was very bland and I would have preferred a little bit of a smell. Nothing strong, but at least something. That's just a personal preference, so if you don't mind having not much of a scent to your lotions then this one is great for getting your feet nice and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Softens tough feet
customer_reviews.text: If you apply every day, this cream really softens your feet...and you notice right away. It’s not a miracle cream, but it works really well.
customer_reviews.author: BottomLine

customer_reviews.title: Buy it! Buy it! Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: If you’ve made it this far, buy this product!! My parents did not believe me when I told them how crazily we’ll this stuff works. My dad’s feet are the dryers, sharpest, creepiest looking feet I’ve seen, so naturally I forced him to use it. He saw results after just a few days. It’s everything I could ask for in a lotion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love gold bond lotions
customer_reviews.text: I love gold bond lotions! This lotion keeps my feet, elbows, knees, and hands soft even throughout the winter. It doesn't make me feel greasy. It's relatively cheap for a lotion and works amazingly well.
customer_reviews.author: Moriah Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Peels like mad!!
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally ordered this instead of GoldBond Healing foot cream (which works great). This stuff is awful! It peels pretty immediately all over the place and I dont think it works well. Do yourself a favor and buy the “healing” cream instead.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Very nice foot cream, very satisfied!!
customer_reviews.text: Feels so nice I love the texture of it. I love lux brand products but I also love to find great deals for drugstore/big box brands. I must say this is the best big box brand foot cream I've ever tried. I partner this with a little palmers hard coco butter at my heels for extra softness since that's my driest area. But without it's still good, also I highly recommend to wear soft cushy socks after to lock that moisture in. I sleep with socks almost every night,but not regular socks get those cozy big sleep socks it is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cammy

customer_reviews.title: Hydrated feet
customer_reviews.text: My feet get SUPER dry and uncomfortable in the winter so I decided to get this and I’m happy I did. It feels slightly greasy when first applied so I use it at night before bed. I wake up with hydrated feet! They’re not exactly softer, but they LOOK much better. Smells very nice and light too.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Made my feet burn
customer_reviews.text: I did not like this product for the above reason. It sounds peculiar but it was true. I gave up on it. Even used it as a hand moisturizer once and it did the same thing to my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Killion

customer_reviews.title: My New Favvvvvvv!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and it does just what it states it will! and more. I was surprised honestly I have cracked heels and need something thick and creamy that will actually work. This delivers and at a great price! It's one of the best foot creams that I have ever used! Try it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works wonders!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I use it in rotation with a cracked heel cream that I previously bought and they work wonders on my feet. I'm on my feet 10 hrs a day for work and on days I have dance class an extra 3hrs. I shower and put this on before bed and throw on shea infused socks...in the morning I repeat the same process with the cracked heel cream minus the shea infused socks. When I get home and kick my shoes off my feet are soft. Only thing I've experienced is it's a bit slippery after application hence why I put on shea socks afterwards, but it's nothing major.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Devastey

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the other 2 oz?
customer_reviews.text: I like Gold Bond products and love it when I get a full bottle of the product which did NOT happen in this case. How do you send a half empty product? Not happy at all. My rating is on the effectiveness of the product which is great! I just wish I had a full bottle.
customer_reviews.author: D Smith

customer_reviews.title: Don’t think about it just BUY it!
customer_reviews.text: Was happy to find this deal online. I got a larger quantity and better price than at a local store in town. Bought one for me and one for my husband. Makes your feet feel great from the moment you rub it in. Not greasy at all . Get one for anyone who has dry skin .
customer_reviews.author: Alberto Casanova

customer_reviews.title: Another great product from Gold Bond
customer_reviews.text: Nothing to dislike about Gold Bond moisturizers. This foot cream is a urea, glycerin, petrolatum, dimethicone based cream with other ingredients of jojoba esters, aloe, Shea butter, silk amino acids and additional ingredients to help soften the feet. Works very well!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: 1/2 EMPTY AND FUNNY SMELL
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! Something was wrong with this tube. Half empty and a funny smell. After putting it on my FEET they started BURNING. I have used this before and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: lauralop

customer_reviews.title: This stuff WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried various foot lotions but this one is hands down the best . During sandal season, my feet would get dry and calloused. Now I apply at bedtime, and in the morning, it's as if the pedicure elves came during the night. It absorbs nicely and doesn't ever feel tacky or sticky. Just soft!
customer_reviews.author: B. Lum

customer_reviews.title: Excellent & quick results!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked really well for me! I had originally reached out to my nail tech and asked for a recommendation. She recommended this cream and I went for it. It works best straight out of the shower! I put a thick layer on with socks, slept in it overnight, and used a pumice bar the following day with excellent results!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Burridge

customer_reviews.title: Trusted brand, great product.
customer_reviews.text: I have always been a fan of Gold Bond products, so when I needed foot care I knew exactly what brand to trust. Works very well as a penetrating foot moisturizer, for dry/cracked or calloused feet. I recommend using after a shower and putting on fluffy socks to let them sit for the best results.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne R.

customer_reviews.title: rip off
customer_reviews.text: It's too bad this could not be returned as it was an add on item I guess I am just out the money. I could almost accept that, but sadly, the tube was only half full when I received it .Shame on you Gold Bond
customer_reviews.author: cheryl

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: My feet were kind of rough around the edges this product provided the moisture I needed to have those baby soft feet. I always apply it when I get out of the shower and immediately put on socks. This is the kind of product you need if your feet are not extremely bad. If they are dry with lots of dead skin I suggest buying something with urea.
customer_reviews.author: David Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: probably the best moisturizer on the planet
customer_reviews.text: Gold Bond is great. This particular product is fabulous. Works so well on my feet, hands, legs. I love it. I have very dry skin and use sesame seed oil a lot. Sometimes I don't want to feel greasy or wear socks. This stuff works!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: debbie

customer_reviews.title: Used!
customer_reviews.text: Bottle is not even filled half way! I just literally got this in the mail today and it feels like the bottle is almost empty
customer_reviews.author: Sreneew00

customer_reviews.title: Been a fan of this lotion for years!
customer_reviews.text: This lotion is everything! I typically use some after showering and then put socks on. I have very rough heels and in conjunction with a large file, this lotion keeps my feet feeling so soft! Gold bond products are great!
customer_reviews.author: MMN

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing! I would buy again. However, I gave it 3/5 because when this arrived it seems like my bottle was half empty? So, i'd buy again because this product is AMAZING but I'd buy from a different vendor on amazon.... since going to the stores is not an option at the moment due to COVID.
customer_reviews.author: Janette

customer_reviews.title: Soft Feet
customer_reviews.text: My feet are happy when I use this, keeps my feet smooth and calloused free, have been using foot cream for maybe 10 yrs..Will not go w/o it...I put this on with cotton socks ...My husband loves the softness it gives to my feet, takes just a dab
customer_reviews.author: Joy4Joy

customer_reviews.title: reminded me a bit of curried lamb - which is fine to eat
customer_reviews.text: This works wonders, really impressed how quickly it did the trick. I'm not a fan of the scent, reminded me a bit of curried lamb - which is fine to eat, but not on my feet - but it'll do.
customer_reviews.author: k

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work. The consistency is too thin so you're adding more of it and it still doesn't work. I don't want sticky but I do want something to go on smoothly and cover/nourish my feet. In about an hour it's as though you didn't put it on.
customer_reviews.author: Precious

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with great ingredients.
customer_reviews.text: I love this foot cream. It has great ingredients and the urea helps to exfoliate and soften my feet. It has a siliconey type of feel when you rub it in but it really helps to keep your feet moisturized. It’s a thick lotion with no scent which I love. Will definitely repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lotion for cracking heels.
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this lotion!! I’m so glad I found it and wish I found it sooner. It is so moisturizing without being greasy or leaving a film layer on the skin. Completely fixed my cracking heels problems.
customer_reviews.author: SevyJane

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST FOR SOFT & SILKY FEET !
customer_reviews.text: Terrific product! Originally just used to extend my Summer pedicures. Results were great. Makes feet silky and very soft without a greasy feel. Also helps soften calluses. I now use all year round.
customer_reviews.author: Allie H.

customer_reviews.title: Not a good product to buy from this person.
customer_reviews.text: I would not buy this again. The bottle did have a seal on it ,look like someone had already used it. Terrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Not sure what it is, but this stuff is amazing. Keeps feet moisturized for an extended period of time and I feel like it actually absorbs into my skin. Not evaporate like some of the scented, watery lotions out there. Makes my feet happy
customer_reviews.author: Ken17

customer_reviews.title: Instantly soothing
customer_reviews.text: It is a really fine and smoothing foot cream. I am on my feet for work a lot and my feet are rough and hurt - this cream is a wonderful balm and refreshes and instantly soothes and softens my feet
customer_reviews.author: Cat-Mom

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for Moderately Dry Feet
customer_reviews.text: It made my feet very soft. I had to use a pumice stone before using this lotion but the effect was excellent. If your feet are so cracked that it's painful, use Dr Scholls Medicated Foot Cream. Otherwise, save your money.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hg

customer_reviews.title: Gold Bond does it again!
customer_reviews.text: After becoming an evangelist for the Gold Bond Rough and Bumpy moisturizer I was hoping this cream would be just as magical - and it is! After one use I could already tell a difference. I run, Muay Thai Kickbox and wear heels at my job...my feet get very abused and now they are so smooth!
customer_reviews.author: MamaWam

customer_reviews.title: Really Good Moisturizer
customer_reviews.text: My heels are typically really rough. However, after using this they are soft to the touch . I just have to apply a few coats throughout the day. This may not be the case for others. Overall it is a really good moisturizer for the hands and feet.
customer_reviews.author: Cierra Pugh

customer_reviews.title: This is my go-to for years as it works and it not crazy expensive
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid product if you are in the market for a thick moisturizer that is not loaded with fragrance. It has a traditional quality to it in terms of brand, but it is effective and not crazy expensive.
customer_reviews.author: DanNyc

customer_reviews.title: not what I'm looking for
customer_reviews.text: This feels great going on, but then my feet HARDEN as a result becoming a sharp shell - not cracking anymore, but very hard. This is not what I'm looking for in a foot moisturizer. Also, I prefer scent-free lotions, and this is not that.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Reader

customer_reviews.title: THIS STUFF
customer_reviews.text: This is just like pure cottony body butter but somehow is super moisturizing and penetrating on my feet. It does not sit on top of my callouses. I love it. I love the effects on my hands as well after applying to my feet. :)
customer_reviews.author: Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Good not
customer_reviews.text: Not as rich as some I’ e used in the past( my fave is Aveda. Ur not nearly as pricey as Aveda either. So it’s a trade off I guess. The Gold Bond is not as “messy” as some products.
customer_reviews.author: Penguita

customer_reviews.title: Helps very dry feet
customer_reviews.text: I like how this made my feel feel. They get so dry my heels crack. Only thing that disappointed me is I thought the container wasn't very full. But I'll still buy again if it helps my feet feel better
customer_reviews.author: SeattleKitty17

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lotion! No greasy residue!
customer_reviews.text: Hands down my favorite foot cream! I put it on every night and I always wake up with super soft feet!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Not very greasy, no strong odors.
customer_reviews.text: This is an okay lotion that I added to my foot care regimen. I have found I still need to use my foot file even after using this every night. Not as greasy as others I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Best cream I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: After trying many different lotions & creams, this one is my favorite. Moistures my feet so well they come out baby smooth. It does finish sort of fast but still going to be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda R

customer_reviews.title: Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves feet super soft after just a few applications! I found it works way fast/better if you apply it before bed and put socks over!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Castaneda

customer_reviews.title: Miracle in a tube
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. It only took one use for my feet to lose all the rough dry skin and become nice and soft just in time for flip flops. I wish I had found this sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Great foot lotion to soften feet.
customer_reviews.text: This product is good stuff! It makes your feet so soft. Even my husband says my 50 grit feet are soft now. Lol but truly it works well and I have tried a lot of lotions for feet. This one is the best by far.
customer_reviews.author: Product reviewer

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: It smells amazing! I bought it for my rough heels but ended up using it on my chest and shoulders too as it’s so thick and creamy, not greasy, and it smaekks so good!
customer_reviews.author: Colette

customer_reviews.title: Super moisturizing with no greasy effect
customer_reviews.text: I love this lotion for your feet. It keeps my feet feeling soft & moisturized for hours without a strong scent. I even use it on my elbows too and they’ve become softer.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Makes my feet happy
customer_reviews.text: I have been using another brand of foot cream and when I couldn't get that, decided to try this one. So glad I did. We both love it, so much so I just ordered two more tubes!
customer_reviews.author: SJ

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great. I’d been looking for so long to find something for my dry feet. I’ve tried many, many, foot creams and this worked the best for me.
customer_reviews.author: Blabbyb

customer_reviews.title: Not full
customer_reviews.text: Can’t speak to long term effects but it smells good. However the bottle was not sealed and half empty.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Good value - does what it says, feels and smells great
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Goes on smooth, seems to help within a few days to soften that callus and make your feet and ankles feel Oh So GOOD! Just the right amount of fragrance, and a rather good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bill F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Foot Moisturizer, Ever
customer_reviews.text: Not greasy. Blends into skin fast. Scent not overpowering. Very moisturizing. Best moisturizer for my feet I’ve ever used...also good for my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Rice-a-Roni

customer_reviews.title: It’s almost like a primer
customer_reviews.text: Your foot is only soft with the lotion on. It’s almost like a primer, but for your feet. Kind of “coats” your feet. Once it wears off, that’s it. Doesn’t have long term healing properties, it’s just lotion.
customer_reviews.author: HBA

customer_reviews.title: Foot Model
customer_reviews.text: I now look like a foot model because of this product.
customer_reviews.author: JustAMan

customer_reviews.title: Silky feet
customer_reviews.text: I like this lotion it hasn’t fixed my rough heels completely but I haven’t been using it as regularly as I should. The rest of my foot is amazingly smooth.
customer_reviews.author: mollieb79

customer_reviews.title: Works wonderfully on dry feet
customer_reviews.text: Love how well this softens my dry, calloused feet in such a short time. I've tried many other creams but this thick, creamy lotion seems to work really well. I'd definitely purchase again. I've been applying it before bed or if I forget, I put it on in the morning before I put socks on. By the end of the day, my feet are noticeably softer. I would highly recommend scrubbing your feet or using a foot file to get dry skin off first and then apply the cream.
customer_reviews.author: kcee74

customer_reviews.title: Nice lotion but came almost empty
customer_reviews.text: The cream works great but like other reviewers I received this tube almost empty:( Really? I may try it one more time because I like the lotion but disappointed that someone would even send it that way
customer_reviews.author: amshpr

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing I can’t wait to give my hubby a pedicure he’s going to love it as much as I do. I will be ordering again soon. The only problem is I would want a large amount.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: Is it used??? No seal
customer_reviews.text: Scared to use it because it didnt have a seal on it like it was new. Every thing these days have a seal to protect it and to show its new.
customer_reviews.author: CARE

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: Gold Bond is a pleasant surprise. My husband and I like their variety of creams. They work like they advertise.
customer_reviews.author: chocoholic

product_meta.description: Style:Softening| Size:Pack of 1Gold Bond Ultimate Softening Foot Cream, 7 penetrating moisturizers. Softens rough calloused feet. Penetrates fast. Non-greasy. Fresh soft scent. As the cream is applied to rough, dry, cracked feet it creates a protective layer of moisture. Softening moisturizers and 3 vitamins penetrate to condition and repair even the toughest skin. Unique blend of hydralast emollients and humectants draw moisture throughout the day, for 24 hour moisturization. Non-irritating. Hypoallergenic, Dermatologist tested.
